pkgmetadata.longdescription: Deepin-wine is a Wine-based compatibility layer developed by Wuhan Deepin Technology Co., Ltd., which is attached to deepin Linux. Deepin-wine's applications work almost out of the box, with fewer bugs(compared to wine).
Deepin-wine是武汉深度科技有限公司开发的基于Wine的兼容层，附属于deepin Linux。 Deepin-wine 的应用程序几乎开箱即用，错误更少（与 wine 相比）。
